resources.string: Are you sure that you want to delete this note?
Your change are not saved. Do you really want to discard your changes?
Choose the new notebook for this note

OKpanda


<img src="https://s3.amazonaws.com/okpanda-misc/automated_email16_en.png" style="margin: 0; padding: 0; max-width: 100%">





Hi{{if FIRST_NAME}} {{FIRST_NAME}},{{else}},{{end}}




Thanks for downloading OKpanda!


As an exclusive thank you offer, if you sign up for a membership with OKpanda in the next 48 hours you will get an entire week of lessons for free!







{{ if USER_HAS_TAG }}
{{ if USER_HAS_TAG["long_term_plans"] }}That means you will get an entire week of the VIP Mastery Course, that's 360 tickets or up to 36 lessons, absolutely free.{{ elseif USER_HAS_TAG["monthly_plans"] }}That means you will get an entire week of the Gold plan, that's 300 tickets or up to 30 lessons, absolutely free.{{end}}
{{else}}That means you will get an entire week of the Gold plan, that's 300 tickets or up to 30 lessons, absolutely free.{{end}}




How do you redeem this limited time offer? Just follow the steps below:

1. Open your OKpanda app.

2. Tap the ticket icon located on the top right of your screen.


{{ if USER_HAS_TAG }}
{{ if USER_HAS_TAG["long_term_plans"] }}3. Select a VIP Mastery Course and complete the signup process.{{ elseif USER_HAS_TAG["monthly_plans"] }}3. Select the Gold plan and complete the signup process.{{end}}
{{else}}3. Select the Gold plan and complete the signup process.
{{end}}

4. Book your first lesson and start learning!


Here are some helpful details about this offer:

• You won't be charged for your 1st week using OKpanda, and you can change your membership or cancel at any time.

• Your monthly renewal date will be exactly one month from the start date of your OKpanda membership. Your membership starts the day you first pay, and your account will renew every month on that date.

• This offer expires in exactly 48 HOURS! Sign up now to start learning today!




<tr> <br> <td> <br> &lt;div&gt; &lt;br&gt; &lt;a rel="nofollow" target="_blank"&gt; &lt;br&gt; See Plans &lt;br&gt; &lt;/a&gt; &lt;br&gt; &lt;/div&gt; <br> </td> <br> </tr>





If you have any questions, please let us know by emailing support@okpanda.com

We can't wait to help you achieve your language learning goals!


OKpanda



<tr style="margin: 0; padding: 0"> <br> <td class="container" bgcolor="#FFFFFF" style="padding: 0; font-size: 17px; line-height: 27px; color: #494949; margin: 0 auto; display: block; max-width: 900px; clear: both"> <p> </p>&lt;table class="row" style="margin: 0; padding: 0px; width: 100%; position: relative"&gt; &lt;br&gt; &amp;lt;tr style="margin: 0; padding: 0"&amp;gt; &amp;lt;br&amp;gt; &amp;amp;lt;td class="wrapper last" style="margin: 0; padding: 0; font-size: 17px; line-height: 27px; color: #494949"&amp;amp;gt; &amp;amp;lt;p&amp;amp;gt; &amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;lt;hr style="padding: 0; margin: 15px; color: #d9d9d9; background-color: #d9d9d9; border: 0; height: 1px; background: #cdcdcd; background-image: linear-gradient(to right, #f4f4f4, #cdcdcd, #f4f4f4)"&amp;amp;amp;gt; &amp;amp;lt;br&amp;amp;gt; &amp;amp;lt;p&amp;amp;gt; &amp;amp;lt;br&amp;amp;gt; Follow OKpanda on social media to get more useful language tips! Contact us using the details below.&amp;amp;lt;br&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;br&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt; &amp;amp;lt;p&amp;amp;gt; &amp;amp;lt;/p&amp;amp;gt; &amp;amp;lt;br&amp;amp;gt; &amp;amp;amp;lt;div class="smalltext unsubscribe-message" style="margin: 0; padding: 0; line-height: 20px; text-align: center; color: #333; font-size: 11px"&amp;amp;amp;gt;E-mail : &amp;amp;amp;lt;br&amp;amp;amp;gt; &amp;amp;amp;lt;a href="mailto:support@okpanda.com" rel="nofollow" target="_blank"&amp;amp;amp;gt;support@okpanda.com&amp;amp;amp;lt;/a&amp;amp;amp;gt; &amp;amp;amp;lt;br&amp;amp;amp;gt; &amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;gt; &amp;amp;lt;br&amp;amp;gt; &amp;amp;amp;lt;div class="smalltext unsubscribe-message" style="margin: 0; padding: 0; line-height: 20px; text-align: center; color: #333; font-size: 11px"&amp;amp;amp;gt;Website &amp;amp;amp;lt;br&amp;amp;amp;gt; : &amp;amp;amp;lt;a href="http://www.okpanda.com/en/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank"&amp;amp;amp;gt;http://okpanda.com/&amp;amp;amp;lt;/a&amp;amp;amp;gt; &amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;gt; &amp;amp;lt;br&amp;amp;gt; &amp;amp;lt;/td&amp;amp;gt; &amp;lt;br&amp;gt; &amp;lt;/tr&amp;gt; &lt;br&gt; &lt;/table&gt; <br> </td> <br> </tr>

Hi{{if FIRST_NAME}} {{FIRST_NAME}},{{else}},{{end}}




Thanks for downloading OKpanda!


As an exclusive thank you offer, if you sign up for a membership with OKpanda in the next 48 hours you will get an entire week of lessons for free!







{{ if USER_HAS_TAG }}
{{ if USER_HAS_TAG["long_term_plans"] }}That means you will get an entire week of the VIP Mastery Course, that's 360 tickets or up to 36 lessons, absolutely free.{{ elseif USER_HAS_TAG["monthly_plans"] }}That means you will get an entire week of the Gold plan, that's 300 tickets or up to 30 lessons, absolutely free.{{end}}
{{else}}That means you will get an entire week of the Gold plan, that's 300 tickets or up to 30 lessons, absolutely free.{{end}}




How do you redeem this limited time offer? Just follow the steps below:

1. Open your OKpanda app.

2. Tap the ticket icon located on the top right of your screen.


{{ if USER_HAS_TAG }}
{{ if USER_HAS_TAG["long_term_plans"] }}3. Select a VIP Mastery Course and complete the signup process.{{ elseif USER_HAS_TAG["monthly_plans"] }}3. Select the Gold plan and complete the signup process.{{end}}
{{else}}3. Select the Gold plan and complete the signup process.
{{end}}

4. Book your first lesson and start learning!


Here are some helpful details about this offer:

• You won't be charged for your 1st week using OKpanda, and you can change your membership or cancel at any time.

• Your monthly renewal date will be exactly one month from the start date of your OKpanda membership. Your membership starts the day you first pay, and your account will renew every month on that date.

• This offer expires in exactly 48 HOURS! Sign up now to start learning today!

We can't wait to help you achieve your language learning goals!


OKpanda

Thanks for downloading OKpanda!


As an exclusive thank you offer, if you sign up for a membership with OKpanda in the next 48 hours you will get an entire week of lessons for free!







{{ if USER_HAS_TAG }}
